location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of service telegram No.976P from the Foreign Secretary to the Government of India (Charles Umpherston Aitchison), Simla to Sir Lewis Pelly, Baroda

mods.abstract: Telegram asking when it would suit Pelly best to make over the charge (handing over responsibility as Special Commissioner at Baroda to Sir Richard Meade).The telegram is signed as a true copy by Cooke [?], Registrar, Foreign Department, Government of India
